1669540.name: Ash of Gods: The Way Demo
1669540.description:
Keep in mind, this is work in progress and will be changed significantly. With this demo we want to demonstrate the idea of the game but are working hard to improve it with new, even more interesting mechanics for battles, unique scripts and rules.

It would be nice to hear your feedback about the game, what you did like and what don't. Please, share your thoughts on Steam forums or come to .
